column1: Little Goat Diner////This place is a great lunch spot! I have been to girl and the goat and was excited for this concept. We sat at the bar while everything looked amazing ordered the Patty Melt
column3: fried pickles and onion rings. Everything was on point and delicious. I actually couldn't get enough of the crab dip - I think I could eat that often with a side salad and be in my happy place.
